question: Name the person who has been conferred for 'Excellent Woman of Excellence' award in 2018 Women Economic Forum.
explanation: Holistic coach and consultant, Nisha Bhalla was felicitated at the recently concluded Annual WEF 2018 Awards. Nisha was presented the 'Excellent Woman of Excellence' award for her spiritual service. Women Economic Forum is the largest global gathering of women entrepreneurs and leaders worldwide that recognises the most successful women across all fields.
